info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.
info.title: BillingManagementClient

get.description: Lists the reservations for a billing profile and the roll up counts of reservations group by provisioning state.

parameters.description: May be used to filter by reservation properties. The filter supports 'eq', 'or', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', or 'not'.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: May be used to sort order by reservation properties.
parameters.name: $orderby

parameters.description: To indicate whether to refresh the roll up counts of the reservations group by provisioning state
parameters.name: refreshSummary

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the reservations for a billing account and the roll up counts of reservations group by provisioning states.

parameters.description: May be used to filter by reservation properties. The filter supports 'eq', 'or', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', or 'not'.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: May be used to sort order by reservation properties.
parameters.name: $orderby

parameters.description: To indicate whether to refresh the roll up counts of the reservations group by provisioning states
parameters.name: refreshSummary

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: The properties associated to this reservation

sku.description: The sku information associated to this reservation

appliedScopes.description: The array of applied scopes of a reservation. Will be null if the reservation is in Shared scope

appliedScopeType.description: The applied scope type of the reservation.

displayName.description: The display name of the reservation

displayProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the reservation for display, e.g. Succeeded

effectiveDateTime.description: The effective date time of the reservation

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the reservation

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the reservation, e.g. Succeeded

provisioningSubState.description: The provisioning state of the reservation, e.g. Succeeded

renew.description: The renew state of the reservation

renewSource.description: The renew source of the reservation

reservedResourceType.description: The reserved source type of the reservation, e.g. virtual machine.

skuDescription.description: The sku description of the reservation

term.description: The term of the reservation, e.g. P1Y

userFriendlyAppliedScopeType.description: The applied scope type of the reservation for display, e.g. Shared

userFriendlyRenewState.description: The renew state of the reservation for display, e.g. On

aggregates.description: The array of aggregates of a reservation's utilization

trend.description: The number of days trend for a reservation

ReservationSkuProperty.description: The property of reservation sku object.

name.description: The name of the reservation sku.

ReservationsListResult.description: The list of reservations and summary of roll out count of reservations in each state.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

summary.description: The roll out count summary of the reservations

ReservationSummary.description: The roll up count summary of reservations in each state

cancelledCount.description: The number of reservation in Cancelled state

expiredCount.description: The number of reservation in Expired state

expiringCount.description: The number of reservation in Expiring state

failedCount.description: The number of reservation in Failed state

pendingCount.description: The number of reservation in Pending state

succeededCount.description: The number of reservation in Succeeded state

ReservationUtilizationAggregates.description: The aggregate values of reservation utilization

grainUnit.description: The grain unit of the aggregate
